Products.DeliveryInformation:
How To Order
  • A Costco Member Service Representative will contact you within 6 business hours (8am - 5pm, Mon - Fri, PST) of placing an order to confirm your order and to discuss delivery options.
  • Please confirm your phone number during the checkout process, as this information is used to contact you.
  • If you must change or cancel an order, please contact Member Services immediately at 1-800-788-9968 so that we may correct the issue before delivery. Representatives are available Mon - Fri from 8am to 5pm, PST.
  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    2. Accept delivery if there is visible damage to the packaging, but no visible damage to the item(s) and note "possible concealed damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    4. Call 1-800-788-9968 immediately if you find concealed damage after delivery has been accepted.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.
  • View Costco's Return Policy.

Warranty
  • For information on the manufacturer's warranty, please contact us at 1-866-861-0450.
  • Costco Business Center's Concierge Service is exclusive to Costco members and offers free technical support and 2nd year warranty.
  • Please note:  All warranties will be voided for non-commercial use or application.

Products.DeliveryInformation:
View Costco Business Center's Concierge Service.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

Products.DeliveryInformation:
View Costco Business Center's Concierge Service.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

View Costco Business Center's Concierge Service.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

Products.DeliveryInformation:
How To Order
  • A Costco Member Service Representative will contact you within 6 business hours (8am - 5pm, Mon - Fri, PST) of placing an order to confirm your order and to discuss delivery options.
  • Please confirm your phone number during the checkout process, as this information is used to contact you.
  • If you must change or cancel an order, please contact Member Services immediately at 1-800-788-9968 so that we may correct the issue before delivery. Representatives are available Mon - Fri from 8am to 5pm, PST.
  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    2. Accept delivery if there is visible damage to the packaging, but no visible damage to the item(s) and note "possible concealed damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    4. Call 1-800-788-9968 immediately if you find concealed damage after delivery has been accepted.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.
  • View Costco's Return Policy.

Warranty
  • For information on the manufacturer's warranty, please contact us at 1-866-861-0450.
  • Costco Business Center's Concierge Service is exclusive to Costco members and offers free technical support and 2nd year warranty.
  • Please note:  All warranties will be voided for non-commercial use or application.

How To Order
  • A Costco Member Service Representative will contact you within 6 business hours (8am - 5pm, Mon - Fri, PST) of placing an order to confirm your order and to discuss delivery options.
  • Please confirm your phone number during the checkout process, as this information is used to contact you.
  • If you must change or cancel an order, please contact Member Services immediately at 1-800-788-9968 so that we may correct the issue before delivery. Representatives are available Mon - Fri from 8am to 5pm, PST.
  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.

    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.

6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

View Costco Business Center's Concierge Service.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

Products.DeliveryInformation:
How To Order
  • A Costco Member Service Representative will contact you within 6 business hours (8am - 5pm, Mon - Fri, PST) of placing an order to confirm your order and to discuss delivery options.
  • Please confirm your phone number during the checkout process, as this information is used to contact you.
  • If you must change or cancel an order, please contact Member Services immediately at 1-800-788-9968 so that we may correct the issue before delivery. Representatives are available Mon - Fri from 8am to 5pm, PST.
  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    2. Accept delivery if there is visible damage to the packaging, but no visible damage to the item(s) and note "possible concealed damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    4. Call 1-800-788-9968 immediately if you find concealed damage after delivery has been accepted.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.
  • View Costco's Return Policy.

Warranty
  • For information on the manufacturer's warranty, please contact us at 1-866-861-0450.
  • Costco Business Center's Concierge Service is exclusive to Costco members and offers free technical support and 2nd year warranty.
  • Please note:  All warranties will be voided for non-commercial use or application.

  • A Costco Member Service Representative will contact you within 6 business hours (8am - 5pm, Mon - Fri, PST) of placing an order to confirm your order and to discuss delivery options.
  • Please confirm your phone number during the checkout process, as this information is used to contact you.

  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    2. Accept delivery if there is visible damage to the packaging, but no visible damage to the item(s) and note "possible concealed damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    4. Call 1-800-788-9968 immediately if you find concealed damage after delivery has been accepted.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

Products.DeliveryInformation:
How To Order
  • A Costco Member Service Representative will contact you within 6 business hours (8am - 5pm, Mon - Fri, PST) of placing an order to confirm your order and to discuss delivery options.
  • Please confirm your phone number during the checkout process, as this information is used to contact you.
  • If you must change or cancel an order, please contact Member Services immediately at 1-800-788-9968 so that we may correct the issue before delivery. Representatives are available Mon - Fri from 8am to 5pm, PST.
  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    2. Accept delivery if there is visible damage to the packaging, but no visible damage to the item(s) and note "possible concealed damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    4. Call 1-800-788-9968 immediately if you find concealed damage after delivery has been accepted.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.
  • View Costco's Return Policy.

Warranty
  • For information on the manufacturer's warranty, please contact us at 1-866-861-0450.
  • Costco Business Center's Concierge Service is exclusive to Costco members and offers free technical support and 2nd year warranty.
  • Please note:  All warranties will be voided for non-commercial use or application.

Products.ReturnPolicy:
View Costco Business Center's Concierge Service.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

Products.DeliveryInformation:
View Costco Business Center's Concierge Service.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.

**How to Inspect your Item:

a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    2. Accept delivery if there is visible damage to the packaging, but no visible damage to the item(s) and note "possible concealed damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

Products.DeliveryInformation:
How To Order
  • A Costco Member Service Representative will contact you within 6 business hours (8am - 5pm, Mon - Fri, PST) of placing an order to confirm your order and to discuss delivery options.
  • Please confirm your phone number during the checkout process, as this information is used to contact you.
  • If you must change or cancel an order, please contact Member Services immediately at 1-800-788-9968 so that we may correct the issue before delivery. Representatives are available Mon - Fri from 8am to 5pm, PST.
  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    2. Accept delivery if there is visible damage to the packaging, but no visible damage to the item(s) and note "possible concealed damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    4. Call 1-800-788-9968 immediately if you find concealed damage after delivery has been accepted.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.
  • View Costco's Return Policy.

Warranty
  • For information on the manufacturer's warranty, please contact us at 1-866-861-0450.
  • Costco Business Center's Concierge Service is exclusive to Costco members and offers free technical support and 2nd year warranty.
  • Please note:  All warranties will be voided for non-commercial use or application.

View Costco Business Delivery's Return Policy.

How to Return: For an immediate refund (including shipping and handling), simply return your purchase at any one of our Costco Business Center or Costco Wholesale warehouses worldwide. If you are unable to return your order at one of our warehouses, please contact Customer Service at (800) 788-9968. To expedite the processing of your return, please reference your order number.

If you request a small parcel item be picked up for return, the item must be packaged and available for pick up in the same manner it was delivered.

If your order was delivered with "Curbside/Threshold" or "White Glove" service, please advise Customer Service if you have disposed of the original package so that they may request the appropriate service for pick up.

Please note: Residential use will void manufacturer's warranty.

Products.DeliveryInformation:
Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

  • A Costco Member Service Representative will contact you within 6 business hours (8am - 5pm, Mon - Fri, PST) of placing an order to confirm your order and to discuss delivery options.
  • Please confirm your phone number during the checkout process, as this information is used to contact you.
  • If you must change or cancel an order, please contact Member Services immediately at 1-800-788-9968 so that we may correct the issue before delivery. Representatives are available Mon - Fri from 8am to 5pm, PST.
  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    2. Accept delivery if there is visible damage to the packaging, but no visible damage to the item(s) and note "possible concealed damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    4. Call 1-800-788-9968 immediately if you find concealed damage after delivery has been accepted.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.
  • View Costco's Return Policy.

Warranty
  • For information on the manufacturer's warranty, please contact us at 1-866-861-0450.
  • Costco Business Center's Concierge Service is exclusive to Costco members and offers free technical support and 2nd year warranty.
  • Please note:  All warranties will be voided for non-commercial use or application.

Products.FullDescription:
• Model: K40GLT
  • Gas Tilting Kettle
  • Dimensions: 46-13/16"W x 28-13/16"D x 39-7/8"H
  • 40 gallon true working capacity
  • Fully insulated, stainless steel

More Information:
  • 100,000 BTU per hour
  • Gas self-contained, stainless steel, 2⁄3 jacketed floor mounted tilting steam kettle.
  • Ellipsoidal bottom kettle liner formed and fully welded standard type 316 and type 304 stainless steel exterior.
  • Heavy bar rim (1⁄4 x 5⁄8 inch 20 gallons) (3⁄8 x 1 inch 40 gallons and greater).
  • Embossed gallon/liter markings.
  • 50 psi (3.4 kg/cm2) steam jacket rating.
  • Stainless steel enclosure for “water resistant” controls, self-locking tilt mechanism and faucet bracket.
  • Controls include a power switch, power “on” light, solid state temperature control, vacuum/pressure gauge, pressure relief valve, low water light and lower water shut-off.
  • Elevation from sea level to 8,999 feet standard.
  • Kettle tilts forward 95° to completely empty.
  • Tubular stainless steel legs with flanged feet.

  • A Costco Member Service Representative will contact you within 6 business hours (8am - 5pm, Mon - Fri, PST) of placing an order to confirm your order and to discuss delivery options.
  • Please confirm your phone number during the checkout process, as this information is used to contact you.
  • If you must change or cancel an order, please contact Member Services immediately at 1-800-788-9968 so that we may correct the issue before delivery. Representatives are available Mon - Fri from 8am to 5pm, PST.
  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    2. Accept delivery if there is visible damage to the packaging, but no visible damage to the item(s) and note "possible concealed damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    4. Call 1-800-788-9968 immediately if you find concealed damage after delivery has been accepted.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.
  • View Costco's Return Policy.

Warranty
  • For information on the manufacturer's warranty, please contact us at 1-866-861-0450.
  • Costco Business Center's Concierge Service is exclusive to Costco members and offers free technical support and 2nd year warranty.
  • Please note:  All warranties will be voided for non-commercial use or application.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.



View Costco Business Center's Concierge Service.

  • A Costco Member Service Representative will contact you within 6 business hours (8am - 5pm, Mon - Fri, PST) of placing an order to confirm your order and to discuss delivery options.
  • Please confirm your phone number during the checkout process, as this information is used to contact you.
  • If you must change or cancel an order, please contact Member Services immediately at 1-800-788-9968 so that we may correct the issue before delivery. Representatives are available Mon - Fri from 8am to 5pm, PST.
  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    2. Accept delivery if there is visible damage to the packaging, but no visible damage to the item(s) and note "possible concealed damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    4. Call 1-800-788-9968 immediately if you find concealed damage after delivery has been accepted.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.
  • View Costco's Return Policy.

Warranty
  • For information on the manufacturer's warranty, please contact us at 1-866-861-0450.
  • Costco Business Center's Concierge Service is exclusive to Costco members and offers free technical support and 2nd year warranty.
  • Please note:  All warranties will be voided for non-commercial use or application.

Products.DeliveryInformation:
How To Order
  • A Costco Member Service Representative will contact you within 6 business hours (8am - 5pm, Mon - Fri, PST) of placing an order to confirm your order and to discuss delivery options.
  • Please confirm your phone number during the checkout process, as this information is used to contact you.
  • If you must change or cancel an order, please contact Member Services immediately at 1-800-788-9968 so that we may correct the issue before delivery. Representatives are available Mon - Fri from 8am to 5pm, PST.
  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    2. Accept delivery if there is visible damage to the packaging, but no visible damage to the item(s) and note "possible concealed damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    4. Call 1-800-788-9968 immediately if you find concealed damage after delivery has been accepted.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.
  • View Costco's Return Policy.

Warranty
  • For information on the manufacturer's warranty, please contact us at 1-866-861-0450.
  • Costco Business Center's Concierge Service is exclusive to Costco members and offers free technical support and 2nd year warranty.
  • Please note:  All warranties will be voided for non-commercial use or application.

Products.DeliveryInformation:
View Costco Business Center's Concierge Service.

Delivery: The estimated delivery time will be approximately 2 to 5 business days from the time of order. Delivery agent will call to set up a delivery appointment.

Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent. Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times than stated above and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.

Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.

1. Deliveries are generally made between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
2. The freight carrier will call you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
3. If the truck needs to return another day, storage and/or re-delivery charges may apply.
4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"

4. Your item(s) will be delivered on a lift gate truck and will be taken off the truck by the delivery driver.
5. Your item(s) will be delivered either curb-side or to your loading dock.
6. Upon delivery please inspect your item(s). **You will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt. Please note any damage to the item(s) or packaging on the delivery receipt or if refusing delivery due to damage, please note on the delivery receipt "refused due to damage".
7. Extraordinary delivery conditions may require an additional fee to be paid.
8. Please note Costco Business Delivery reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

**How to Inspect your Item:
1. Is the box wrapped in plastic? If yes, please remove the plastic so the box is clearly visible.
2. Does the box have any creases or is it ripped? If yes, please cut open the creased or ripped area of the box to inspect the actual unit for dents, dings or holes:
a. If you see damage, please refuse the piece of equipment and note; "refused due to damage"
b. If you do not see damage, please accept and note on the BOL "possible concealed damage"
c. If box(es) looks fine, please sign for delivery and write "subject to inspection"
d. Should you find concealed damage later, please notify Customer Service or call 1-800-788-9968 immediately.

  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.

How To Order
  • A Costco Member Service Representative will contact you within 6 business hours (8am - 5pm, Mon - Fri, PST) of placing an order to confirm your order and to discuss delivery options.
  • Please confirm your phone number during the checkout process, as this information is used to contact you.
  • If you must change or cancel an order, please contact Member Services immediately at 1-800-788-9968 so that we may correct the issue before delivery. Representatives are available Mon - Fri from 8am to 5pm, PST.
  • Additional Non-Special Order items ordered at the same time will be delivered on the preferred delivery date selected at checkout.
  • For additional information, read our FAQs.

Delivery
  • Special Order Commercial Appliance items are not available for next-business-day delivery and may require up to 5 weeks for delivery.
  • Deliveries are generally made Mon - Fri between the hours of 8am and 5pm, local time, and require you to be present when your item(s) is delivered.
  • The freight carrier will contact you when the item(s) arrives at their terminal to make a delivery appointment.
  • Upon delivery you will be required to sign a Proof of Delivery receipt.
  • A re-delivery and/or storage charge may be assessed if the carrier arrives and no one is there to receive and/or sign for the order.
  • Item(s) will be delivered to your loading dock.  Curbside delivery is available at an additional cost.
  • Extraordinary delivery requirements may necessitate an additional fee to the delivery agent.
  • Island, mountain and rural/remote delivery locations are subject to longer delivery times and possible cancellation when outside the carrier's delivery zone.
  • Delivery is not available in Alaska, Hawaii or Puerto Rico.
  • Costco Business Center reserves the right to make delivery in installments when necessary.

Inspection Upon Delivery
  • Remove any outer wrapping so the box is clearly visible.  
  • Cut open any creased or ripped areas of the box to inspect the item(s) for dents, dings or holes.
    1. Refuse delivery if item(s) is damaged and note "refused due to damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    2. Accept delivery if there is visible damage to the packaging, but no visible damage to the item(s) and note "possible concealed damage" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    3. Accept delivery if there is no visible damage to the packaging or item(s) and note "subject to inspection" on the Proof of Delivery receipt.
    4. Call 1-800-788-9968 immediately if you find concealed damage after delivery has been accepted.

Returns
  • Special Order Commercial Appliances are manufactured to unique specifications and cannot be returned or refunded, except for warranty repair and/or replacement due to failure to meet specifications.
